about_the_game: Fire up the grill and become everyone's favorite meat man with the BBQ CHEF skill pack. Get beefier attacks with the knife and cleaver, gain more health from delicious meats, cause bigger explosions to charbroil any zombies in range and make fatal use of the condiment bar! Even better - fricassee up some vittles at any stove with the frypan and restore spoiled food through touch alone!
detailed_description: Fire up the grill and become everyone's favorite meat man with the BBQ CHEF skill pack. Get beefier attacks with the knife and cleaver, gain more health from delicious meats, cause bigger explosions to charbroil any zombies in range and make fatal use of the condiment bar! Even better - fricassee up some vittles at any stove with the frypan and restore spoiled food through touch alone!
name: Dead Rising 2: Off the Record BBQ Chef Skills Pack
short_description: Gain access to a special sword attack and level up faster with the COSPLAY WARRIOR skill pack!
